AI triage (gemini): Feature request to add Wake-On-Lan functionality; ConnectionInfo already has MacAddress property but logic and UI command are missing.
Approach: Create WakeOnLan helper class to send magic packets. Add 'Wake On LAN' menu item to ConnectionContextMenu. Wire up menu click to send packet using ConnectionInfo.MacAddress.
